params.delegateSignature: An optional ECDSA delegateSignature if this is a delegated attestation. Use `""` or `0x` otherwise.

params.resolverFeesERC20Token: ERC20 token address used for payment.

revoke(uint64,string,address,uint256,byt.details: Emits `AttestationRevoked`. Must be called by the attester.

params.delegateSignature: An optional ECDSA delegateSignature if this is a delegated revocation.
params.extraData: This is forwarded to the resolver directly.
params.reason: The revocation reason. This is only emitted as an event to save gas.
params.resolverFeesERC20Amount: Amount of funds to send to the hook.
params.resolverFeesERC20Token: ERC20 token address used for payment.

revoke(uint64,string,bytes,bytes).details: Emits `AttestationRevoked`. Must be called by the attester.

params.delegateSignature: An optional ECDSA delegateSignature if this is a delegated revocation.
params.extraData: This is forwarded to the resolver directly.
params.reason: The revocation reason. This is only emitted as an event to save gas.

revoke(uint64,string,uint256,bytes,bytes.details: Emits `AttestationRevoked`. Must be called by the attester.

params.delegateSignature: An optional ECDSA delegateSignature if this is a delegated revocation.
params.extraData: This is forwarded to the resolver directly.
params.reason: The revocation reason. This is only emitted as an event to save gas.
params.resolverFeesETH: Amount of funds to send to the hook.

revokeOffchain(string,string,bytes).details: Emits `OffchainAttestationRevoked`. Must be called by the attester.

params.delegateSignature: An optional ECDSA delegateSignature if this is a delegated revocation.
params.reason: The revocation reason. This is only emitted as an event to save gas.

attest((uint64,uint64,uint64,uint64,addr.notice: Makes an attestation where the schema hook expects ERC20 payment.
Makes an attestation where the schema hook expects ETH payment.

attestBatch((uint64,uint64,uint64,uint64.notice: Batch attests where the schema hook expects ERC20 payment.
Batch attests where the schema hook expects ETH payment.

attestationCounter().notice: Returns the current on-chain attestation counter. This is incremented for each `Attestation` made.

getDelegatedAttestBatchHash((uint64,uint.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated batch attestation.

getDelegatedAttestHash((uint64,uint64,ui.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated attestation.

getDelegatedOffchainAttestBatchHash(stri.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated batch offchain attestation.

getDelegatedOffchainAttestHash(string).notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated offchain attestation.

getDelegatedOffchainRevokeBatchHash(stri.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated batch offchain revocation.

getDelegatedOffchainRevokeHash(string,st.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated offchain revocation.

getDelegatedRegisterBatchHash((address,b.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated batch registration.

getDelegatedRegisterHash((address,bool,u.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated registration.

getDelegatedRevokeBatchHash(uint64[],str.notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated batch revocation.

getDelegatedRevokeHash(uint64,string).notice: Returns the hash that will be used to authorize a delegated revocation.

revoke(uint64,string,address,uint256,byt.notice: Revokes an existing revocable attestation where the schema hook expects ERC20 payment.

revoke(uint64,string,uint256,bytes,bytes.notice: Revokes an existing revocable attestation where the schema hook expects ERC20 payment.

revokeBatch(uint64[],string[],address[],.notice: Batch revokes revocable on-chain attestations where the schema hook expects ERC20 payment.

revokeBatch(uint64[],string[],uint256[],.notice: Batch revokes revocable on-chain attestations where the schema hook expects ETH payment.

schemaCounter().notice: Returns the current schema counter. This is incremented for each `Schema` registered.
